abstract: Notable quotes from business articles that appeared in The New York Times last week.
snippet: Notable quotes from business articles that appeared in The New York Times last week.
lead_paragraph: “I’ve been working with these social bots for a really long time, and now they look like real people online — even though they are not.”Tim Hwang, chief scientist at the Pacific Social Architecting Corporation, a research group. Companies are selling social bots, lines of code built to behave like people on social media sites, to provide things like Twitter retweets and Facebook “likes.”
